alert.note: Alert for Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued January 29 at 1:14PM PST until January 30 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST MONDAY FOR PYRAMID LAKE... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. Waves 2 to 4 feet. * WHERE...Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone to capsizing and should remain off lake waters until conditions improve.
info.instruction: Check lake conditions before heading out and be prepared for a sudden increase in winds and wave heights. Consider postponing boating activities on the lake until a day with less wind.

area.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
